answers.answer: High blood pressure and protein  in urine are signs of preeclampsia.  What did your doctor say?
Had growth scan today and told she's within range but smaller end of scale. Also no protein in urine now or blood and no infection. Panic over until 2 weeks time when I have another scan xx

question: Been told I'm measuring a week behind so getting a growth scan tomorrow. I also had blood pressure of 160/80 and had traces of blood and protein in my wee. Just hoping its a urine infection. Anyone had anything similar xxx
title: worried
